articles.description: As the vaccine rolled out, leaders remind the public to not let their guards down when it comes to COVID-19 safety practices.
articles.content:
MILWAUKEE - A first in Milwaukee, the COVID-19 vaccine has been administered to some health care workers at Aurora St. Luke's Medical Center.
The nurses and doctors are among the first in Wisconsin … [+2128 chars]

articles.title: WWII veteran shares what it was like to get COVID-19 vaccine - WCVB Boston
articles.description: She said she was pleasantly surprised to be able to get the shot so soon.
articles.content: BEDFORD, Mass. —Less than three days after the first COVID-19 vaccine received government authorization, a World War II veteran in Massachusetts became the first Veterans Affairs patient in the count… [+1133 chars]
